data.text: Had a very good experience ,,, the hotel is 10 min from the centre but easy acces with taxi ,,, all the staff was very nice and professional ,,,, a special mention goes to Prem the barman from the lounge area outside ,,,, who made us feel very welcomed and some of the best cocktails I ve tried ,,,, overall a nice experience and I would recommend
data.title: Holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear R6901FApaulof,

We're thrilled to hear that you had such a positive experience during your stay at Oaks Ibn Battuta Gate Hotel.

It's fantastic to know that you found our hotel conveniently located with easy access to the city center via taxi. 

We're delighted that our team made your stay enjoyable and that you received excellent service throughout. We'll be sure to pass along your special mention to Prem and commend him for making you feel welcomed and serving some of the best cocktails you've tried. 

Thank you for recommending us and we look forward to welcoming you back for another pleasant experience in the future.

Warm regards,
Oaks Management
owner_response.author: Oaks Ibn Battuta Gate Hotel

data.text: I like this hotel. All are good people. Hasun always helping. Room is clean and tidy. Breakfast always lot of option. Spa also nice and with discount. Gym also big and lot of machines. We will come again ans choose Okas ibn Baruta Gate hotel dubai
data.title: Nice staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 604aigerima,

We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Oaks Ibn Battuta Gate Hotel Dubai.

It's fantastic to know that you found our team to be friendly and helpful, particularly highlighting Hasun's assistance. 

We're glad you found your room clean and tidy and appreciated the variety of breakfast options available. 

It's great to hear that you enjoyed our spa facilities, especially with the discount and that our gym met your expectations with its size and range of machines. 

We're honored that you plan to return and choose our hotel again for your next visit to Dubai. We look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful stay.

Warm regards,
Oaks Management
owner_response.author: Oaks Ibn Battuta Gate Hotel

data.text: This Hotel and aspecial the crew is outstanding. We felt valued the whole time and enjoyed the respectful and  cordial handling of the hotel crew. Special thanks to  the lifeguard  Dave and Mr Hasun from the wellness and pool-area for their professional and  kind service. Thanks for all... We will come back next time.  Kathrin & Frank from Germany

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Resort56016737741,

Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback.

We're thrilled to hear that you had such a fantastic experience with us and felt valued throughout your stay. 

It's heartening to know that you appreciated the respectful and cordial handling from our hotel crew. We're especially grateful for your recognition of Dave and Hasun from the wellness and pool area, for their professionalism and kind service. 

Your kind words mean the world to us and we're delighted to hear that you'll be coming back next time. We can't wait to welcome you both back for another memorable stay with us. Safe travels until then.

Warm regards,
Oaks Management
owner_response.author: Oaks Ibn Battuta Gate Hotel

data.text: Deila was really nice to us she assisted my kids and helped them, she also took really good care of them and she even face painted their face it was an amazing experience for them they had so much fun. Deila was really kind. I had so much fun and the food was really good.
data.title: Deila was really nice

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 647mayare,

We're thrilled to hear about the wonderful experience you and your family had with Delia.

It's fantastic to know that she went above and beyond to assist your kids, providing them with an enjoyable experience and even going as far as face painting, which I'm sure added an extra layer of excitement to their stay. We're glad that Delia's kindness and care made such a positive impact on your experience with us. 

Additionally, we're delighted that you had a great time overall and that you found our food to be delicious. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for more memorable moments in the future.

Warm regards,
Oaks Management
owner_response.author: Oaks Ibn Battuta Gate Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 645eleanap,

Thank you so much for your kind words.

We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and found our hotel beautiful, with clean and comfortable rooms. 

It's wonderful to know that you found the food amazing and that our team members, Ravinder and Suraj, contributed to making your stay happy and comfortable. 

We're delighted that you appreciated the proximity of a large mall nearby for shopping and that our entire staff left a positive impression on you. 

Your satisfaction is our priority and we look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay in the future.

Warm regards,
Oaks Management
